## Data Files

All datasets used in the analysis, as well as a [cleaned-up Excel file](https://github.com/stacyderuiter/mammal-allometry/raw/main/data/bmr_cardio_condensed-June23-2022-use for paper.xlsx) containing all data, are available on [the manuscript's github repository](https://github.com/stacyderuiter/mammal-allometry) in the [data directory](https://github.com/stacyderuiter/mammal-allometry/tree/main/data).

*Note: upon publication, citation info will be provided here too.*

## Supplemental Information

Code and results for all model fitting are available in the [project github repository](https://github.com/stacyderuiter/mammal-allometry). The .Rmd files in the main directory are the R source code; you can also view a [compiled version](supplement.html) on this site.
